alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 11:51AM AKST until January 29 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing snow with areas of low visibility occuring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Winds gusting to 40 mph will cause blowing and drifting snow. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Elliott Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 PM today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 40 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow over Elliot Highway Summits. Winds are expected to decrease this evening with conditions slowly improving. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
